attributes.action: call an immediate General Election due to a loss of trust in MP's due to the expenses issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that many MP’s have been abusing the expenses system.  I call upon the Prime Minister to dissolve parliament immediately and call a General Election to allow the people of the United Kingdom to properly decide if their MP should continue in office.  The way many MP’s have behaved has resulted in a loss of trust and this can only be restored through our democratic right to elect trustworthy, honourable members of parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
